name: Crazy Bee Color Change
description:
Watch out! Crazy bee is on the loose!
Crazy Bee Color Change is the game where you need to clear boards to pass to the next level. In order to do this make all the bees to have the same color. Easy to learn, hard to master.
Many levels to play. Share with your friends and compete with each other on Game Center.
Have fun! Highly addicting game!
cd90e76605
